Free Learning Resources¶

General Development

  • If you already know a few languages and want to see how things are done in Python, try Learn X in Y Minutes.

  • For beginners, Microsoft has a 44-video course, Python for Beginners.

  • Automate the Boring Stuff with Python​​​​​​​.

  • /`r/Python - There are also additional resources in the sidebar.

  • Learn Python - Full Course for Beginners [Tutorial].

  • w3schools Python Tutorial.

  • Beginner’s Guide to Python from the Python documentation.

  • CoreyMS.com and his YouTube channel.

Web Development

  • Official Django Documentation.

  • Python Django Web Framework - Full Course for Beginners.

  • Official Flask Documentation - This includes a quickstart, a tutorial, patterns, and much more.

  • Learn Flask for Python - Full Tutorial.

  • Full Stack Python.

Cloud

  • Azure Functions Python developer guide.

  • Building Lambda functions with Python.

Data Science

  • scikit-learn official website​​​​​​​.

  • TensorFlow 2.0 Complete Course - Python Neural Networks for Beginners Tutorial.

  • PyTorch for Deep Learning - Full Course - Tutorial.

​​​​​​​ * 10 minutes to pandas.

  • Python for Data Analysis (book).

PluralSight Learning Resources¶

PluralSight learning resources can be accessed using our Python COE Learning Resources channel or they can be accessed by the individual course links below.

General Development

  • Core Python: Getting Started​​​​​​​.

  • Python – Beyond the Basics.

  • Python Best Practices for Code Quality.

  • Unit Testing with Python.

  • Advanced Python​​​​​​​

Web Development

  • Django: Getting Started​​​​​​​.

  • Flask: Getting Started

  • Full Stack Web Development with Python (WEB2PY).

Cloud

  • Azure Functions Fundamentals (The code is written in C# and JavaScript, but this should give some familiarity with Azure Functions)

  • AWS Developer: An Introduction to AWS Lambda.

Data Science

  • Data Science: The Big Picture.

  • Introduction to Data Visualization with Python.

  • Making Data into Something You Can See.

  • Data Analytics Literacy path

  • Python for Data Analysts path

  • Building Machine Learning Solutions with scikit-learn path

  • Building Machine Learning Solutions with Tensorflow path

​​​​​​​* Building Deep Learning Solutions with PyTorch path
